snippet.title: Beyond your Fear - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Beyond your Fear is a psychological puzzle horror game.

Play now:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1913890/Beyond_your_Fear/

Descend into an atmospheric, story-driven psychological horror game where the player must investigate a case, solve riddles, and make hard choices on the way to uncovering what lies beyond your fear.
